entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers and wet flurries late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023
